Bitcoin hits $50k level for first time in more than two yearsBitcoin hit the $50,000 level for the first time in more than two years as the world's largest cryptocurrency was buoyed by expectations of interest rate cuts later this year and last month's regulatory nod for U.S. exchange-traded funds designed to track its price. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 15:40:55 GMT MBQ2C2PVHZMRRIHTUPPBROLFZY https://www.reuters.com/technology/bitcoin-hits-highest-more-than-two-years-2024-02-12/Hannah Lang, Elizabeth Howcroft技术
Morning Bid: 5,000 reasons for optimismA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Amanda Cooper. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 13:16:12 GMT HUECO2MMHROOTFIQXGQP22YX5M https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-view-usa-2024-02-12/Reuters市场
Macron names former Engie chief as envoy for future Asia-EU corridorFrench President Emmanuel Macron named the former head of gas utility Engie as its special envoy to a multinational rail and ports project linking the Middle East and South Asia tipped as an alternative to China's Belt and Road initiative. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 09:57:07 GMT S2XSYD3N2ZNSNASWMEI45CRSFU https://www.reuters.com/world/macron-names-former-engie-chief-envoy-future-asia-eu-corridor-2024-02-12/Reuters世界
Stocks, dollar inch higher as investors await CPI dataGlobal stock indexes and the U.S. dollar edged higher on Monday ahead of this week's U.S. consumer price index report, which could provide clues on when the Federal Reserve is likely to begin cutting interest rates. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 09:34:49 GMT CBC7OQI4FJMRNJOTDIF4EACLGA https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-pix-2024-02-12/Caroline Valetkevitch市场
Dollar gains as markets await U.S. inflation dataThe dollar edged higher against the euro and other major currencies on Monday as investors await data on U.S. inflation and retail sales this week for clues on when the Federal Reserve may begin widely anticipated interest rate cuts. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 09:08:14 GMT OFPXVNSE2NJBDP3YSORS2LKBQI https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/dollar-steady-us-inflation-data-tops-this-weeks-bill-2024-02-12/Herbert Lash, Alun John市场货币
Stellantis uses surplus plants in Europe as leverage in a fight with RomeA recent war of words between Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni and Stellantis CEO Carlos Tavares has exposed a tough new reality: Europe's one-time homegrown national automakers have become global players ready to exploit the EU's overcapacity of car factories to obtain better government deals. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 06:05:18 GMT ZAJ34IMYHBOCRFIBTPKA6MRGQI https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/stellantis-uses-surplus-plants-europe-leverage-fight-with-rome-2024-02-12/Giulio Piovaccari, Nick Carey商业汽车与交通
